offer_settings.offer_highlight: Receive a complimentary reusable bag, mug, or calendar with $100 purchase.                                                  Receive 1 gift with purchase of $300; 2 gifts with purchase of $500 or more; 3 gifts with purhcase of $700 or more. Gift selection includes reusable bag, coffee mug, calendar, select t-shirts, bag-on-wheels, seect tote bags, or a video postcard.

Gift selection includes reusable bag, coffee mug, calendar, select t-shirts, bag-on-wheels, seect tote bags, or a video postcard.

marks.terms:
Unless otherwise stated above, for this offer to be valid, the cardmember shall:
(1) pay with a Diners Club or any card within the partner network which is mutually agreed upon, in writing by the parties;
(2) show the offer in print or mobile phone; and
(3) if explicitly required by the merchant, enter the promotional code if purchasing online.
Only one offer per cardmember can be used and cannot be combined with any other offer, unless otherwise stated. This offer is non-refundable, transferable and carries no monetary alternative.
marks.name: Diners Club Acceptance Mark

offer_settings.terms: <p>All gifts are subject to availability. Redemption must be made within fourteen (14) days of the receipt date. All receipts fifteen days or older are null and void. Discarded or “found” receipts may not be used for redemption. Redemption must be made by the actual purchaser(s). ABC Stores reserve the right, in their sole and absolute discretion, to refuse redemption and/or change this promotion at any time.</p>
